77589341-fc65-4213-ba26-e1781445ae6b.description: The earner of this badge has basic knowledge of high intensity functional work. They understand the basic techniques of barbell work, kettlebell work, suspended and suspended work. They also are knowledgeable in the 6 fundamental movements: push, pull, twist, bend, lunge, squat and the lesson formats of the GRID ACTIVE.
77589341-fc65-4213-ba26-e1781445ae6b.name: GRID ACTIVE

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge must complete the two days of training and the final exam

147916a4-fc95-4193-8084-49c671ce2435.description: The earner of this badge has basic knowledge of Pilates technique applied on the Reformer. They understand how to use the tool safely and how to allow participants to experience the reformer in accessible and innovative group classes. They also are knowledgeable in the n°08 fundamentals GR Pilates Series:Footwork, Arms,Supine Legs, Short & Long Box, Stomach Massage,Long Stretch,Knee Stretch,Split & Standing Stretch
147916a4-fc95-4193-8084-49c671ce2435.name: Group Reformer Pilates

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the three training days and the final exam.

1ab7aff5-2e70-431f-a283-e105d2359b5f.description: The holder of this badge has demonstrated technical competence and teaching skills, including attitude VAI, training, and innovation. The earner has demonstrated an ability to work in a team as well as presence, administrative abilities, appropriate uniform, and participation in meetings.
1ab7aff5-2e70-431f-a283-e105d2359b5f.name: Audit Personal trainer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the course.

6ba552bd-37a5-441c-8efc-d02a2338f7c5.description: Earners of this badge understand what an Active Pump is and are knowledgeable in the new format and objectives. They are capable of reading descriptive scripts with music and using both technique and didactics of the main exercise.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Active Pump training Course.

4c0114d7-e196-45cf-81bf-6d9c21dfe2e3.description: The earner of this badge is able to introduce and describe the swimming pool environment and main activities involed in water fitness/aerobics. They understand the gola of water fitness and are able to successfully structure a lesson that include a warm up and call-down using main tools and exercises. Earners can also host pracitical workshops on the poolside and water.
4c0114d7-e196-45cf-81bf-6d9c21dfe2e3.name: Percorso Water Fitness

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the training days of Water Fitness Course and pass the final Exam.

f0f38d0c-7f87-4483-aefe-80711366c4ff.description: The holder of this badge holds skills in boxing and functional main movements and exercises. They are competent in knowledge and didactic application of the warm-up phase;. and immediate understanding of "Weak points" of each user during the warm-up phase. They are able to format lessons, communicate techniques, carry out call the contents relating to punch boxing studio release and regressions and progressions of the main exercises.
f0f38d0c-7f87-4483-aefe-80711366c4ff.name: Punch Boxing Studio

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Punch Boxing Studio Training Course.

b1e0c94b-b091-4930-8ccc-9c3feab38a1a.description: The earner of this badge has basic knowledge of high intensity functional work. They understand the basic techniques of: skillmill, skillrow, skierg. They also are knowledgeable in the fundamental movements of: kettlebell, dumbbells and medball. They know how to set up a workout with considering the Covid restriction.
b1e0c94b-b091-4930-8ccc-9c3feab38a1a.name: GRID

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Grid training course.

5918be67-7c39-4e98-8569-89eba9f97373.description: Earners of this badge understand the basic contents of functional training expected in a class of H.E.A.T. They are familiar with the SKILLMILL tool and its usage. They are also adept in setting up a class and accomodating for any changes needed during a lesson. They are capable of presenting and explaining how to use the Connect Console and how to register and assigne members to heart rate belts.
5918be67-7c39-4e98-8569-89eba9f97373.name: Formazione H.E.A.T.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the H.E.A.T. training course.

ed2f8d45-be73-403e-8c58-8e624732fc2d.description: The earner of this badge is able to design and implement boxing classes using a variety of different coaching and exercise techniques. They can incorporate basic boxing combination movements into their class, using macro cycle structure periodization. Earners also incorporate the subdivision of the three Punch levels (basic, medium, advanced) into their classes.
ed2f8d45-be73-403e-8c58-8e624732fc2d.name: Punch Focus

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Punch Focus Training Course.

6cfd6db3-8ee1-41bd-871e-8a05b68627d7.description: The holder of this badge is able to format lessons of Full Body, Sculpt, Upper Body, Low Body, abdominal. The earner is competent in the theory of cardiovascular work and muscle conditioning.
6cfd6db3-8ee1-41bd-871e-8a05b68627d7.name: PERCORSO TONIFICAZIONE MODULO AVANZATO

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Advanced toning training course.

1addea8f-4e89-4fd9-97a2-803d0303e435.description: The holder of this badge has learned the following skills: introduction to the Virgin Active company: history and mission; Elements of business strategy and customer experience; Commercial development strategies for the personal trainer; Managerial and Operational aspects of the Personal Trainer; Services and Activities in Virgin Active Italy. "Customer induction": PT Experience, Coaching; Finance: tax and legal aspects of the Personal Trainer; Main contents of the Franchising PT contract.
1addea8f-4e89-4fd9-97a2-803d0303e435.name: Induction Personal Trainer

badge_template_activities.title: Complete The induction Personal Trainer course.

f1cf5d11-a59e-4fe3-b101-391cec8f8be7.description: The holder of this badge is able to use the Indoor Cycling Bike related to the format and set the Bike from Indoor Cycling according to the Work Out Fitness that will be performed. They have knowledge in posture to be used to correctly execute the format; Rhythm of the music; Gaits related to the musical Rhythm;Lower Body Techniques, related to gaits;Construction of a typical lesson, using the structures in the reference manual; How to communicate effectively to the class.
f1cf5d11-a59e-4fe3-b101-391cec8f8be7.name: Cycle Race & Cycle Burn

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Cycle Race&Burn training course.

10f15775-f9d0-463e-b2f9-88a5f59c7c34.description: The holder of this badge is capable in the use of the bike from indoor Cycling related to the cycle spirit format, setting of the Bike from indoor cycling according to the Total Body Workout that will be performed. The earner has knowledge in posture to be used to correctly execute the Cycle Spirit format, rhythm of music, upper and lower body techniques, related to gaits, use of tools provided for upper body training (Chains) and construction of a typical lesson.
10f15775-f9d0-463e-b2f9-88a5f59c7c34.name: Cycle Spirit

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Cycle Spirit Training course.

24de955c-6303-4d08-854b-acddffed4a9f.description: The holder of this badge is able to present the Postural Fusion course. The earner is cabable of noting how to use the tone of voice during the lesson;reflecting on the type of exercises to be included during a class; and how to propose exercises and give alternatives to students with pathologies.
24de955c-6303-4d08-854b-acddffed4a9f.name: Workshop Postural Fusion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Postural Fusion Training Course.

e8468700-2703-4409-a0bb-84e609e67d15.description: The holder of this badge has learned the following skills: bar format + (class structure); use of the 3 tools (mat, softball, dumbell) for the different body districts; knowledge of the specific benefits of barre + training ;knowledge of fundamentals and positions of upper and lower limbs in the barre +; knowledge of the musculature and anatomy of the segments involved; use Epidemic Sound for the playlist; management of class levels and any members with physical problems.
e8468700-2703-4409-a0bb-84e609e67d15.name: Barre+

31ff1ecf-ab8b-435d-b6c8-1e2c87176bda.description: The earner of this badge understands the protocol of a lesson and is able to structure a lesson. They have skills needed to define goals, choreograph technique, and use water tools.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the training day of Water Tone workshop.

236c4699-9f36-4765-8376-fee9de6dcc3e.description: The earner of this badge understands the history of TRX as well as the physiology/biomechanic elements essential for the use of the instrument. They know how to assemble and adjust TRX bands and are knowledgable of the basic positions and main exercises/variations used with TRX. Earners can lead one-to-one workouts and music classes using exercises adapted to the various main osteo-articular pathologies.
236c4699-9f36-4765-8376-fee9de6dcc3e.name: Allenamento in Sospensione

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the suspension training course.

7f2bbfd3-e7a1-4b34-8476-a66151ce9ada.description: The earner of this badge is able to design and lead effective and safe cycling classes. They teach participants how to set their bike, and utilize different positions and pedaling techniques. Additionally, they understand the effects of hydrostratic pressure on the cardiovascular and respiratory systems. Throughout their classes they use verbal and gestural cueing.
7f2bbfd3-e7a1-4b34-8476-a66151ce9ada.name: Water Bike

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Hydrobike training course

4d03df45-2a3a-4a7e-8adc-988fff1e2860.description: The holder of this badge has learned the following skills, Teaching skills Basic Steps Dance, basic functional technique, Choreographic construction, Approach to the methods of cueing and teaching Fitness and Dance, Approach to the analysis of the musical structure of the tracks and of the count, Management of "Performance" during the class.
4d03df45-2a3a-4a7e-8adc-988fff1e2860.name: Dance+

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the two days course and pass the final exam.

b82ea5a1-9f80-4718-be71-bf2c68626faa.description: The holder of this badge is cabable of teaching calming and relaxing yoga practices. b82ea5a1-9f80-4718-be71-bf2c68626faa.name: Yoga Calm

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the course.

1fc580b3-5894-45bd-ab05-9174d5ef8b39.description: The holder of this badge can use skills in extension inflection ratios, technical barycenters, opposite chains of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd degree, the discriminant, and counter plyometric exercises. The earner can use basic, intrinsic resistance, spontaneous, and induced activations, can navigate attitude and decubitus changes, and has skills in load vector directions, varus and valgus connected to sagittal plane stabilization, and joint availability tests.
1fc580b3-5894-45bd-ab05-9174d5ef8b39.name: Riprogrammazione Posturale

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the  postural reprogramming training course

3a5d4f44-4334-4185-805b-3b303de82b97.description: The earner of this badge understands the history of the gravity system and is knowledgeable of the tool and general safety instructions. badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Gravity Foundation Training Course.

a0951893-c4fd-4d77-94a8-c072d123bb81.description: The earner of this badge understands the evolution of functional training and is able to implement the 8 'columns' of the movement (Part 1). They also understand didactic progression amd are able to identify the most common variations and typical corrections of push/pull fundamental patterns.
a0951893-c4fd-4d77-94a8-c072d123bb81.name: Functional Training Evolution Level 1

3d10c40c-97e8-43e2-a13f-307ac36b900d.name: WATER ENDURANCE

97fcaeca-1b29-44a7-9339-0792c6165457.description: The holder of this badge can use skills in the The Music: beat or beat, musical phrase, period or block, master beat, syncope, tempo;Aerobic basic steps and steps. The earner is competent in teaching systems: linear progression (free style), top and tail, link, addition (add on), pyramid decreasing, layers;Cueing;Families and movement cycles; Basic Sequences (patterns); Direct insertion by postposition.
97fcaeca-1b29-44a7-9339-0792c6165457.name: PERCORSO TONIFICAZIONE

cac3b068-8d0b-4552-ad64-831bf9349daa.description: The holder of this badge owns have knowledge in the Introduction to Yoga: History, Philosophy and Keywords; Sanskrit: Glossary To Easily Understand The Name Of Each Asana; Samkhya Philosophy: The 25 Cosmic Elements; Human Body in Yoga: Chakra, Nadi, Kosha, Prana; Principles of Sequence Construction; Surya Namaskara; Sun Salutation; Basic Asana;Hasta Mudra:the Walls of the Hands; The use of mantras in yoga practice; Basic Pranayama How to Manage a Class; The Meaning of Numbers in Yoga.
cac3b068-8d0b-4552-ad64-831bf9349daa.name: Approach to yoga 1

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Approach to yoga course and the 20 hours of internship.

2a90786e-cddf-44a3-874d-96906ae52fc1.description: The holder of this badge is capbable of providing guidance on excercises using a kettilebell. The earner is competent in applaying time-based movement methodology and functional evaluation on basic movements.

5d21073d-be54-44ed-82d0-97cd181eb13a.description: The earner of this badge is able to design and teach cycle classes in a spirit ride format, instructing participants in agility and strenght workouts. They understand the chain tool and how to use it class and structure their classes using music and advanced communication techniques (cueing, teaching off the bike, teaching one to one, coaching, focus and visualization.

03831a3f-1a83-4b93-91a4-dd090833aed5.description: The earner of this badge is knowledgeable in Pranayama and the sequence of Ashtanga Vinyasa Yoga first series. They understand the conditions for yoga practice and associated exercisess too improve muscle flexibility and joint mobility.

8a874ada-271b-44de-bba9-8229ffdb31cc.description: The earner of this badge has a history of the Gravity System and the principles of the GRAVITY Pilates basics. They also understand how to introduce a Gravity Pilates class using music in relation to the Pilates technique. Earners can implement one-to-one working protocols during class and utilize exercies inspired by the repertoire of Pilates matwork and reformers.

c77c7849-a481-4c1c-ba5c-3d491ef57bb6.description: The earner of this badge is knowledgeable about the story behind the Pilates method and understands the principles of the Pilates method. They have a basic understanding of the anatomy and biomechanics of the main muscle groups and knowledge of the Powerhouse. Earners are able to use gesterual, verbal, and imaginative cueing during class while incorporating main machines and tools, basic Pilates positions, and being aware of progression and regression related to the level of intensity proposed.

1b959a55-8406-4057-994c-6a6a35572f26.description: The earner of this badge understands yoga supports and is knowledgeable in the introduction and presentation of props, including overrall management of the classroom. They are capable of using blocks, bricks, belt-belt, and boster-cushion.

f2d13b38-1a71-4bc8-9433-e0a5df95599f.description: The holder of this badge can use skills in protocol definition, format objectives, and advantages of interval training in water. e3e8411a-63b1-4809-9ad0-5356b27c1173.description: The earner of this badge are able to set up the free body ABC and implement the Four of the Apocalypse: tractions, pushups, squats, and abs. Earners also implement a variety of movements into their workouts, including muscleup, frontlever, vertical squat, and pistol squats.

555aaf63-ed80-4ae7-8659-c3022260e892.description: Earners of this badge are knowledgeable in functional training in water. They know the difference between traditional and functional training. They understand and can apply the structure of a watergrid lesson. Structure of a Watergrid lesson.

4190e694-a6bd-40bf-9e98-1e1656c72745.description: Earners of this badge display knowledge in the fundamentals of the class (target, duration, clothing) calorie consumption (burn calories with speed changes to the rhythm of the music and changes in resistance loads) Importance of BPM music; 2 Bike setting, posture on and off the saddle, hand positions; 3 Gaits, Jog, S2S (side to side), Hill; 4 Resistances; 5 Techniques (jumps, off seat, Intervals with resistance, increasing resistance; tap back, back in 2/4/8; 6 Structure of a 50min class.

56ed43b5-8a58-4a48-b7ef-acb186a04641.description: The earner of this badge understands the 4 pillars of functional training. CLASS.

830958b6-362e-40e6-96ff-ff6225fb2900.description: The earner of this badge understands the history of the kettlebell tool and is able to execute and teach the five main movements with a kettlebell (Swing, Clean, Military press, Turkish get up, Snatch). 4b977662-0320-4ba2-833c-5af15ea715bd.description: The earner of this badge displays the characteristics of a good swimming school and exibits qualities of a good instructor by using successful teaching methologies. be139955-11de-4106-852e-c522ae319892.description: Earners of this badge are knowledgeable in using Yoga Wall tools, such as bricks, belts, chairs, boxes, ropes, and sticks. They are familiar with the Parināma Yoga method M. Bruno Baleotti and are capable of creating the first asanas and preparatory exercises with the Yoga Wall using Parināma Yoga.

588ff284-e822-474a-a419-f4d273cf96a6.description: Earners of this badge are knowledgeable in building a lesson on music and understand music structure. 588ff284-e822-474a-a419-f4d273cf96a6.name: Functional Step 1°livello

214255ef-2d29-4356-9e7c-dfdc75508572.description: The earner of this badge understands the importance of correct posture when weight training with overloads in order to create compenstations that lead to wear of the structures of the musculoskeletal system.

ceb7cfba-6fc7-4a07-b4d8-9e9f05ea7fa8.description: The holder of this badge is capable of psychological and physical analysis of the boy (10-14 years) and can use flooring, barbell, and kettlebells. The earner is familiar with the lesson format timing, phases (warm-up, central, and final), and how and when to use the game component. The earner can analyse main exercises (air squat, front squat, push press, shoulder press, deadlift, sumo deadlift high pull) and teach preparatory work for free-body gymnastics (verticalism and bar work).
ceb7cfba-6fc7-4a07-b4d8-9e9f05ea7fa8.name: Cross Active Teen

2f535b3d-e444-4408-b4d9-b2260a27075a.description: The earner of this badge understands Red training protocol: Anatomy, applied biomechanics, muscle systems, training basics, lesson structure, planning and periodization of muscle work. 2f535b3d-e444-4408-b4d9-b2260a27075a.name: Formazione Red Training

6139c960-ef62-4ee7-b7ed-2be7bf561bd8.description: The owner of this badge knows the following skills: Basic rules of a functional step instructor, Study of the structure of Music (phrases, sequences, periods), Use of Cueing typologies, Analysis of the basic steps of musical fitness, Use of the Step (safety, platform height, correct posture directional approaches), Step family analysis, Teaching methods (linear progression, pyramidal, unilateral bilateral, add on), Methods of didactic construction, Construction strategies.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 16 hours training course and pass the final exam.

8b978b63-389c-43c0-96c6-e28dc88f06f5.description: The owner of this open badge has learned the basic functions of the main social media platforms such as: Facebook, Instagram, linkedin, TikTok, and how to use them as a professional in the field of fitness.
8b978b63-389c-43c0-96c6-e28dc88f06f5.name: Social media&fitness (modulo base)

badge_template_activities.title: The holder of this badge has fully followed the 8-hour online training day, delivered by Virgin Active Academy and Edelman Agency.

45b6199a-3d8e-4f60-b00d-5f30d2af558c.description: The earner of this badge understanding the theory of training in aquatic fitness. They are able to take a mental approach to their water fitness classes while incorporating muscle conditioning, interval and intermittent training, and choreographic teaching. Earners use cueing and effective communication during their classes
45b6199a-3d8e-4f60-b00d-5f30d2af558c.name: Acqua Fitness 2¬∞ livello

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Water Fitness Instructor Training Course and pass the final exam.

0bbaab2f-8bb4-4e18-8f26-e9348fbb1deb.description: The holder of this badge has learned the following skills: Breathing and diaphragm;Difference between mobility and flexibility;Joint by joint method;analysis of ANKLE mobility;Analysis of the stability of the knee; hip motion analysis; partavetebral stability analysis; analysis of scapolohumeral mobility; Progression and regression exercises contextualized to the problem.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 8 hours training course.

d821260f-7b84-47ef-a8c3-3ed73f472fd3.description: The earner of this badge is able to incorporate mobility and functional flexibility and well as yog and weight-lifting into their classes. They have the skills necessary to teach static and assisted squat therpay, vinyasa, static and assisted overhead therapy, funtional flexility work, and static and assisted handstand pregressions and core stability.
d821260f-7b84-47ef-a8c3-3ed73f472fd3.name: Functional Yoga

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Functional Yoga Training Course.

d249ee01-3876-43a1-a664-1b962c08a7d5.description: The holder of this badge is capable of psychological and physical analysis of the boy (10-14 years) and has knowledge of tools including flooring, barbell, kettlebells, and Queenax. The earner is familiar with the lesson format timing, phases (warm-up, central, and final phases), and how and when to use the game component. The earner can teach 7 main movements (push, pull, squat, bend, lunge, twist and move) and main exercises used with propaedeutics and didactic progressions.
d249ee01-3876-43a1-a664-1b962c08a7d5.name: Grid Teen

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the teen Grid training course.

aa39c309-59a9-4c71-9c97-03fd04174370.description: The earner of this badge understands the basic concepts of observation and posture related to muscle chains. They have knowledge of the physiology of balance (proprioceptive, vestibular, visual), column pathology and paramorphisms, and the physiology of stretching. Earners are able to lead lessons focused on postural and stretching using verbal and gestural cueing.
aa39c309-59a9-4c71-9c97-03fd04174370.name: Istruttore Olistico 1¬∞ LV

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Holistic InstructorTraining Course and pass the final exam.

00db5341-22a6-4e18-a5d8-5a32f28249af.description: The holder of this badge is capable of psychological and physical analysis of the boy (10-14 years) and can assemble, lengthen, and shorten the Trx tool and its main sockets. The earner is familiar with lesson format and timing, including the phases (warm-up, central, and final phase), when and how to use a game component, and main exercises to be used with propaedeutics and didactic progressions.
00db5341-22a6-4e18-a5d8-5a32f28249af.name: Allenamento in Sospensione Teen

e5b11fec-8a54-49de-9b1c-e6d6296a2e21.name: Social media&fitness (modulo avanzato)

d3eacf72-dbdd-412c-b760-c54c40a2b531.description: The holder of this badge can explain the basic principles of functional bodyweight training The are able to apply BODYWEIGHT lesson in time with music; Analysis of a BODYWEIGHT lesson divided into "blocks" of work involving multiple body segments or Methods to increase and decrease the intensity of training based on the user Practical laboratory dedicated to the creation of work blocks aimed at improving specific districts ( strength, endurance, balance, display strength ).

e4aa9892-9e64-474a-bd35-d6866f293fe7.description: The earner of this badge has the knowledge and skills needed to successfully teach and implement parent-child water classes using techniques that help suport the parent-child relationship. They are familiar with Asana - conditions - propaedeutic exercises in asana - sequences of sun and moon greetings - theory and practice; construction of a sequence - theory and practice;pranayama - theory and practice; anatomy in relation to practice; thin anatomy and aims of ayurveda.

10bf8bfd-52de-4c6f-b9d2-249cffb48146.description: Earners of this badge are knowledgeable in Water Fitness and have successfully completed the Virgin Active Academy "Acqua Fitness" training days held at the A.S.D. OASI SPORT di LACCHIARELLA. Earners possess theoretical and practical knowledge of water fitness and are capable of planning, leading, and leveraging tools to conduct effective classes.

16878c43-65ab-4702-9bac-7590f48903c8.description: The holder of this badge has competent knowledge in training theory and methodology; functional and postural ergonomics; screening and mobility; sports traumatology; theory and methodology of functional training; elements of psycho-pedagogy for the personal trainer; technique and teaching for increasing strength; elements of statistics, research and performance analysis; technique and teaching for increasing power; conditioning - Construction of circuit trainings; nutrition.

d203a137-68d1-4da8-8760-81cc42e2eabe.description: The holder of this badge is able to carry out a functional step lesson with advanced construction techniques: -irregular cycle - chaining - cut to three. e931d292-0deb-4adb-8bf1-1c735394e2bc.description: The Mobility Advanced course is a course aimed at all trainers who wish to deepen their knowledge and skills relating to joint mobility and flexibility. During the training day the contents covered in the basic module and the following topics will be studied in depth: Crawling primal movement (animal drills) Core advance with band (Chop and lift) Exercises of progression and regression contextualized to the problem.
e931d292-0deb-4adb-8bf1-1c735394e2bc.name: Mobility Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 8 hours training day.

9c885acf-f5e7-4ed3-b738-450c1712d372.description: The Strength course is entirely dedicated to the study of strength. Perfect for all those who want to update themselves by increasing the tools at their disposal to develop workouts that include specific strength work, suitable for all types of customers, as they are modular educational. It is a technical-practical seminar dedicated to understanding the standard level of strength through the study of the main conditioning exercises.
9c885acf-f5e7-4ed3-b738-450c1712d372.name: Workshop Strength

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the 8 hours training course to obtain this badge.

9e0d88a6-c56a-4415-b568-0b07ace3c1c7.description: The earner of this badge is able to build a fairy tale to practice yoga while having fun with children. bac19c2a-78ef-4761-bf15-a975d9b6730a.description: The owner of this badge has acquired the following skills: Anatomy The basic muscular skeletal system, The cardiorespiratory system and energy systems - basic; Body composition and basic nutrition principles, Elements of Psychology, communication and retention strategies, motivational strategies; Training principles - Strength and endurance, aerobic work, stretching; Training planning: machines and free weights
bac19c2a-78ef-4761-bf15-a975d9b6730a.name: Gym Fitness Instructor

4e71f289-2c65-4e05-a7dd-4e6436e90ace.description: The holder of this badge is capable of psychophysical analysis of the adolescent (11/15 years), training of coordination and conditional skills, and biomechanical analysis and relative assistance of simple free-body elements with relative progressions and regressions. The earner is familiar with structural learning of the lesson, communication techniques aimed at specific motivation to the target, and how and when to use game components.

1ab59b25-62aa-4901-87f3-442c37b34ced.description: The earner of this badge is knowledgable about the origins of indoor cycling and is able to successfully design and lead and indoor cycling class using a heart rate monitor, correct posture on the bike and hand position, as well as endurance and moutntain work protocols. They also understand the elements of biomechanics and muscle action during pedaling.

6f47012a-2972-4d75-83e6-9379e44dd1db.description: The holder of this badge is competent in the mastery of the basics: all the fundamental kettlebell exercises, different variations and, above all, the key principles of physical training at the base and associated with each movement; Coaching skills; Exercises covered: Double Swing, Double Clean, Double Press,Double Push Press, Double Jerk (taught but not tested on),Double Long Cycle (Clean + Jerk - taught but not tested on), Double Snatch, Double Squat, Double Get up.
6f47012a-2972-4d75-83e6-9379e44dd1db.name: Kettlebell 2¬∞ livello

4632a3ae-d511-4ad1-adc7-9d2ec99ba39f.description: The earner of this badge understands what interval training is, the benfits of interval training, and the users suitable for this type of activity.

009aea2c-19f2-4031-9961-228ac68cc2ba.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the Water Fitness assessment and is certified to teach Water Fitness classes in Virgin Active clubs. They are also able to access a 2nd level training or an advanced workshop on favorable terms.

0abd754d-3f0d-49a9-af05-bcb1936748e0.description: The earner of this badge undestands the history of yoga and the benefits of practicing yoga. The are knowledgable on the physiology of respiration and stretching. Earners understand channels, energy centers, mudra of the hands, and postrual fixations as it relates to yoga practicies. They are able to lead participants in key positions (muscle chains involved, musculoskeletal, physiological, visceral, psychological, emotional and related energies).

89bd5c0c-c496-4971-8774-d899ac8c323a.description: The holder of this badge can communicate verbally, nonverbally, and socially. The earner is familiar with physiological problems of adolescents, knows how to use TTZ Basic techniques, and can create a musical profile.

106a949c-2345-489f-b3f6-1ad6ddc4ab10.description: The earner of this badge understands the beneifts of practicing yoga during pregnancy and has knowledge of Indian female Gods and Uma and motherhood. They are able to implement yoga practices during all trimesters of a pregnancy as well as childbirth, practicing Pranayama, Bandha-s, and Asana-s techniques.

5ef868f9-06d0-4a0c-afcd-f7ae6b6488a6.description: Earners of this badge possess the technical, communication, and physical requirements to carry out the activity of an instructor within Virgin Active Italia fitness centers.

229cd25e-bc93-4ee8-ae35-6a027fe6337a.description: The holder of this badge can use skills in protocol definition, format objectives, and advantages of interval training in water. 4aaa9591-48a5-4191-ba47-aabebce833af.description: The holder of this badge has skills in understanding Virgin Active: the company, history and mission; Elements of business strategy and customer experience; Commercial development strategies for the personal trainer; Managerial and operational management of the Personal Trainer; Services and Activities in Virgin Active Italy. 9267f5b5-fb86-412f-8225-254845da81b2.description: The earner of this badge understands when and how to use choreographic maps, as well understanding the concept of fluidity and inertia of movement. Additionally, they understand advanced teaching construction methods (cross phrasing, auxiliary step, etc. etc.), didactic progression analysis, and periodization of a basic/advanced step class. They also are able to perform analysis of the contraindicated steps and the biomechanical analysis of why they should never be performed
